name: Compass Diversified Holdings
description: Compass Diversified Holdings (CODI) is a leading investment firm that specializes in acquiring and managing a diverse portfolio of middle-market companies. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Westport, Connecticut, CODI aims to provide its investors with a steady stream of income while also achieving long-term capital appreciation. The firm seeks to invest in companies that exhibit strong market positions, experienced management teams, and promising growth opportunities. With a focus on consumer products, industrial products, and niche sectors, CODI's portfolio includes well-known brands in various industries such as eyewear, outdoor products, and furniture. The company actively engages with its portfolio businesses, providing strategic guidance and operational support to drive growth and enhance profitability. As a publicly traded entity, CODI operates under a unique structure that allows it to qualify as a regulated investment company (RIC), enabling it to distribute most of its earnings to shareholders as dividends. This strategy not only supports income generation for investors but also aligns with the firm’s goal of long-term value creation. CODI is committed to responsible investing and actively seeks opportunities to promote sustainability within its portfolio companies.
